readingMnemonic: <kanji>Ripples</kanji> come off of your scooter and car from when they were hit by a tsunami. More importantly, those things were <reading>ren</reading>tals (れん), so ripples or not, it doesn't matter if they were hit by a tsunami.
meaningMnemonic: As the <radical>tsunami</radical> hits your <radical>scooter</radical> and your <radical>car</radical>, it alters the wave, creating <kanji>ripples</kanji>.
